Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Tableau \Ta`bleau"\, n.; pl. {Tableaux}. [F., dim. fr. L. tabula a painting. See {Table}.] 1. A striking and vivid representation; a picture. [1913 Webster]
2. A representation of some scene by means of persons grouped in the proper manner, placed in appropriate postures, and remaining silent and motionless. [1913 Webster]
3. (Solitaire) The arrangement, or layout, of cards. [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
tableau n 1: a group of people attractively arranged (as if in a painting) [syn: {tableau vivant}] 2: any dramatic scene [also: {tableaux} (pl)]
